name: Shinsekai (VR)
description:
Shinsekai is a VR multiplayer sandbox game, the project aim to provide a good scripting architecture to build mini-games or more sophisticated servers.

This is a pre-alpha version, freely available to everyone for testing, but you can pay what you want to support the project.

Since it is a pre-alpha version, there will be crashes and bugs, the game will update frequently, if you experience issues, you can report them here (after signing in).

A wiki with tutorials is available to create your own servers and scripts in lua.

Pre-alpha notes

  • launch SteamVR before launching Shinsekai to prevent potential errors
  • (when in game) one of your controller (must be left) can open the game menu by pressing the APP button, the other controller can browse it with the laser pointer (the white spike), pressing PAD_UP will zoom in, PAD_DOWN will zoom out, TRIGGER to click
